question: Show opinion pieces and feature articles with volume of 01.
sql_query1:
SELECT Opinion_Pieces.title
FROM Opinion_Pieces
WHERE Opinion_Pieces.Volume = "01"
UNION
SELECT Feature_Articles.title
FROM Feature_Articles
WHERE Feature_Articles.Volume = "01"
sql_query2:
SELECT Opinion_Pieces.title
FROM Opinion_Pieces
UNION
SELECT Feature_Articles.title
FROM Feature_Articles
WHERE Feature_Articles.Volume = "01"
interpretation1: What opinion pieces are volume 01 and what feature articles are the same volume?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all opinion pieces and also provide a list of feature articles with volume of 01.
